title: 📝 Daily Summary — Feb 22, 2026
content:
# **Saturday, February 22, 2026**

## What We Built

### Trader Tab (New Feature - Main Build)
- **New dedicated trading workspace** between Trade and Market tabs in sidebar
- **Multi-market support**: 🇺🇸 NYSE/NASDAQ, 🇬🇧 LSE, 🇦🇺 ASX with flag filter tabs
- **Real-time data**: Twelve Data WebSocket + REST fallback for live quotes
- **Smart watchlist**: Autocomplete search with click-to-add, drag-and-drop reordering (@hello-pangea/dnd)
- **Chart timeframe selector**: 1M, 5M, 15M, 1H, 1D, 1Mo, ALL with persistence per symbol
- **Extended hours indicators**: ☀️ pre-market (4:00-9:30 AM), 🌙 post-market (4:00-8:00 PM)
- **Hover delete** on watchlist items, new tickers prepend to top

### Market Movers Page (Refactored)
- **3-column layout**: Gainers | Losers | Most Active (side-by-side, no tabs)
- **Transparent starfield background** with glass-style borders matching Calendar page
- **List-style rows** instead of solid cards
- Increased font sizes to 14px for readability
- Removed numbered rank boxes

### X-Ray Page (Integrated)
- **Integrated into Dashboard as tab** (was separate full-page view)
- Added starfield transparent background and glass panels
- Moved position: under Global Markets in sidebar, before Market tab
- Fixed "Delayed fallback" message → shows "Live • [time]" when WebSocket connected
- **Income statement waterfall chart → column chart** (all bars start from bottom baseline)

### Global Markets Page
- **3-column layout**: 🇺🇸 NYSE | 🇬🇧 LSE | 🇦🇺 ASX (removed Tokyo - no data)
- Added flags + abbreviations in headers
- Changed to full exchange names in columns
- Reduced auto-update from 10 seconds → 5 minutes (stopped yellow flash)

### Analytics Page (Complete Overhaul)
- **Replaced entire page** with Highcharts portfolio dashboard
- Morningstar demo integration (NFLX, MSFT, AMZN, GOOGL)
- Portfolio performance chart, KPI cards, stock grid
- €200/30-day investment simulation
- Transparent background theme

### Crypto Page
- Added **Stop and Trailing Stop** to order type dropdown
- Added **$/% toggle** for trailing stop amounts
- Changed order ticket background from glass → solid black (#060d18) to match chart
- Made Cancel button red on hover
- Removed "Alpaca L2 WebSocket" label (using Twelve Data)

### War Room
- **Disabled auto-prefetch** (4th time fixing this!)
- Now loads instantly, only fetches when user clicks Quick Scan
- No longer pre-fetches 3 AI scans on mount

### Landing Page Polish
- Changed "Dashboard" button from green → white text
- Removed "NASDAQ" from badge, added "🇦🇺 Australia" before Crypto
- Made all "Get Started - $9.99/mo" buttons faded (5% bg, 20% border)

### Sidebar Reorganization
- **New order**: War Room → Trader → Crypto → Global Markets → X-Ray → Market → Community → Terminal → Active Strategies...

### Deletions
- **Deleted old TradePage.jsx** (2,165 lines removed) - fully replaced by TraderPage
- Removed Tokyo Stock Exchange (TSE) from all pages (Twelve Data doesn't support Japanese pricing)

## What We Fixed

### Critical Fixes
- **TickerPill.jsx price mismatch**: Was using Alpaca API, switched to Twelve Data for consistency
- **Vercel cache issue**: Production was serving 17-day-old deployment - resolved by checking deployment history
- **Sydney/ASX symbols**: BHP works, BHP.AX returns "not authorized" - use base symbols without `.AX` suffix
- **War Room auto-prefetch**: Disabled again (4th occurrence) - permanently commented out with note
- **Chart viewport persistence**: Apply saved zoom before fitContent to prevent reset on symbol change

### UI/UX Fixes
- Removed border/outline from Dashboard button on landing page
- Made green highlights more subtle (selected ticker + sidebar tab)
- Matched watchlist ticker font size (text-[13px]) to sidebar labels
- Centered Trader market filter tabs, brightened pipe separators
- Fixed crypto order ticket overflow and internal scrolling
- Updated footer to show 'Twelve Data' instead of 'Alpaca'
- Fixed grey screen crash with Error Boundary + XRay imports
- Restored drag-to-pin functionality in TraderPage

## Key Decisions

### Data Architecture
- **Twelve Data for ALL prices**: Consistency across watchlist, charts, pinned pills (not Alpaca)
- **Multi-market tabs**: Filter search results by exchange to reduce symbol confusion
- **Extended hours detection**: `marketHours.js` helper for pre/post market indicators
- **Chart persistence**: Save zoom/scroll per symbol+timeframe combo

### Design Direction
- **3-column layouts**: Market Movers, Global Markets (replaced tab interfaces)
- **Glass + starfield theme**: X-Ray, Market Movers matching Calendar page aesthetic
- **Solid black order tickets**: Crypto page (#060d18) to match chart background
- **Faded CTAs**: Lower opacity buttons (5% bg, 20% border) for subtle premium feel

### Technical Choices
- **@hello-pangea/dnd**: Reliable drag-and-drop reordering (formerly react-beautiful-dnd)
- **Twelve Data WebSocket**: `wss://ws.twelvedata.com/v1/quotes/price` for live data
- **Analytics dashboard**: Highcharts portfolio demo (Morningstar integration)

## Important Info

### Twelve Data Pro Plan
- **Cost**: $29/mo
- **Limits**: 1,597 API calls/min + 1,500 WebSocket credits (no daily limits)
- **Coverage**: 75 global exchanges - US (NYSE/NASDAQ), UK (LSE), Australia (ASX base symbols)
- **Does NOT support**: Japan (TSE), Australia `.AX` suffixed symbols (use BHP not BHP.AX)
- **WebSocket URL**: `wss://ws.twelvedata.com/v1/quotes/price`

## Known Issues

### In Progress
- **Shrinking drag effect**: Implemented but not working - `data-pill-slot` elements only exist in Dashboard.jsx's TopMetricsBar, not in KrakenDashboard.jsx
  - Options: Add TopMetricsBar to KrakenDashboard OR scale based on viewport top 200px

### Pending External
- **TradingView Advanced Charts**: Applied for library access, follow-up email drafted and ready to send
- **Highcharts build warning**: Analytics page needs `@highcharts/dashboards` npm package (may fail build)

## Notes

- **Sydney market discovery**: Works with base symbols (BHP) but `.AX` suffix returns authorization errors - Twelve Data quirk
- **War Room prefetch lesson**: This is the 4th time we've fixed the auto-prefetch issue - permanently disabled with comment
- **Tokyo removed everywhere**: Twelve Data doesn't provide Japanese stock pricing on any plan
- **Order ticket backgrounds**: Crypto solid black, rest glass/transparent - intentional design split
- **~85 commits today**: Mostly incremental feature builds + polish iterations
